openExternalLinkDialogMessage: Do you want to open this external link:
CheckForUpdatesError: An error occurred while checking for updates.
DownloadUpdateError: An error occurred while downloading the update.
updateUnavailable: You are already up to date with RoaringRoster {version}.
updateAvailable:
There is a newer RoaringRoster version {availableVersion}. 
You are currently using {installedVersion}. 
Would you like to download and install the {downloadSize} update now?
updateDownloaded: A new version has been downloaded. Restart RoaringRoster to apply the update.
GenericUpdateError: An error occurred while checking for or installing updates.
UsernameInvalid: The username may only contain the characters A-Z, a-z, 0-9, ".", "-" and "_" and must be at least two characters long. Please check and correct the username.
UsernameExists: This username is already taken. Please choose another one or try to log in if you created this user account yourself.
UsernameDoesNotExist: This username does not exist on this device. Please add this user first on this device and then try again.
WrongPassword: The password is incorrect. Please check and correct it.
EncryptionCorrupted: The data of this user can no longer be decrypted. You can only delete this user on this device and re-register this device with this user account again.
FatalAppError: The app contains a serious error. Please check if an update is available or contact support.
UsernameUnregistered: This username is not registered or the code is invalid or expired. Please check both details and try again or receive a new invitation.
ConnectionError: No internet connection to the server. Please make sure your device is online or try again later.
NotLoggedIn: You are not logged in (anymore). Please log in first.
passwordChangeSuccessMessage: You have successfully changed your password.
appCopyrightNotice: Copyright © Michael Kamphausen - All Rights Reserved
acknowledgementsIntro: Many people have contributed to the creation of RoaringRoster in a variety of ways, whether by programming, translating, supporting, encouraging, inspiring, providing feedback, or offering advice. We thankfully celebrate all of them for their contributions!
acknowledgementsOpenSourceIntro: This app is built on top of software components and uses fonts that are developed by many people and that are freely published under open source licenses. Without these external components, the development of RoaringRoster would not be possible with reasonable effort. We are deeply grateful to all contributors to these {count} open source projects for their time, experience and passion they invest in developing and improving the projects:
ossComponents: Open Source Software Components and Fonts
externalRepositoryHint: Open external project repository with source code {url}
deleteAccountMessage: All data of the user {username} stored on this device will be irretrievably deleted.
betaAppWillExpire: This beta test version will expire on **{date}**.
AppIsReadOnly: The beta test version has expired. Data can only be read, but no longer created or edited.
betaAppExpirationDescription: From that point on, you can continue to read or export your data, but you can no longer edit or create new data.
